properties.title: Cloud optical property profiles, averaged per overpass along 1x1 degree grid_Global_CALIPSO
properties.description: Cloud optical property profiles (extinction and backscatter coefficients, particle depolarization ratio) at 532 nm. The products are provided for all CALIPSO overpasses, using the CALIPSO L2 aerosol product horizontal resolution of 5km. TEST
properties.osc:project: Lidar Climatology of Vertical Aerosol Structure for Space-Based Lidar Simulation Studies-LIVAS
